topic: Tell me about a challenge you faced / STAR Method
content:
Situation: We faced a [e.g., 50% drop in performance / critical bug] right before the deadline.
Task: My responsibility was to [e.g., optimize the database queries].
Action: I used [Tool/Method, e.g., SQL indexing and caching]. I also coordinated with the frontend team to reduce API calls.
Result: We improved performance by [X]% and launched on time.

Strategy: Real weakness + Improvement Plan (Don't say 'I work too hard')

1. [Weakness]: Sometimes I struggle with [e.g., public speaking / delegating tasks / perfectionism].
2. [Action]: To improve, I have started [e.g., joining Toastmasters / using Trello for time management].
3. [Result]: I have seen significant improvement in [Specific Area] and I am continuing to work on it actively.
